name: The Arka Prints
description: A modern nod to nature, Arka brings together clean lines and earthy forms. Designed as a triptych, this set anchors any wall with quiet movement and organic balance.

name: The Rill Vase Trio
description: Sculptural yet subtle, the Rill Vases echo the rhythm of water in their soft ridges. Perfect alone or as a grouping, they bring gentle structure to any surface.

name: The Linea Clock
description: Where time meets clarity — Linea is a study in balance and rhythm. Crafted in matte black metal, it brings quiet structure to any wall without ever shouting for attention.

name: The Élan Mirror Set
description: Sculptural and luminous, the Élan Mirrors turn reflection into art. Their asymmetrical harmony and softened edges elevate everyday walls with graceful intention.

name: The Fold Table Lamp
description:
The Fold Table Lamp brings sculptural rhythm to your lightscape.
Its solid wood base is fluid yet grounded, while the pleated shade adds playful structure. Designed to illuminate quietly - and beautifully - in any corner of your home.

name: Spiral Taper Candles with Wooden Candle Holders
description: Made from a natural soy + beeswax blend and hand-poured in Dakar, Senegal. All candles are hand mixed and poured, so no one candle is the exact same. Minor imperfections are normal and a part of each candle's uniqueness.

name: The Haven Wall Display
description:
The Haven Wall Display brings warmth to any vertical space.
Crafted from solid wood and designed with balance in mind, it highlights the beauty of simplicity. Perfect for showcasing dried florals, ceramics, or small treasures. Hand-finished for a natural feel that complements Japandi and minimalist interiors alike.

name: The Nest Coat Stand
description:
The Nest Coat Stand blends practicality with soft elegance.
Crafted from solid wood and paired with a woven basket base, it serves as a natural landing spot for everyday essentials. With its airy frame and warm materials, it's as much sculpture as storage—perfect for Japandi, boho, or minimal interiors.

name: The Kyoto Wall Lantern
description:
The Kyoto Wall Lantern brings serenity to your space.
Handcrafted with solid wood and a bamboo shade, its warm glow evokes quiet evenings in traditional tea houses. Perfect for creating a soft, atmospheric touch in hallways, bedrooms, or cozy corners.
